blockers.issue: BLOCKER: 1 UNSIGNED report(s) found. Preliminary report indicates right breast mass and suspicious right axillary lymph node.

checklist.Clinical: 58-year-old patient diagnosed with Stage IIA invasive ductal carcinoma of the right breast. The patient has well-controlled Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, Hypertension, and Hyperlipidemia.
checklist.Pathology: Invasive ductal carcinoma, Grade 2. ER: Positive (90%), PR: Positive (75%), HER2: Negative (IHC 1+).
checklist.Radiology: Latest Scan (CT): No evidence of distant metastatic disease. Primary tumor right breast measuring 2.6cm with suspicious right axillary lymphadenopathy (largest node 1.2cm, suspicious morphology). Liver, lungs, bones unremarkable.
checklist.Genomics: Key pathogenic mutations: PIK3CA H1047R, TP53 R273H. TMB: TMB-Low.
checklist.Contraindications: 9 drug profiles available for treatment planning.

patient_details.notes: All data is present and clear, setting status to READY.

checklist.Clinical: 52-year-old female diagnosed with Stage IIB invasive lobular carcinoma of the left breast. She has a history of hypothyroidism and anxiety disorder.
checklist.Pathology: Invasive lobular carcinoma, Grade 2, ER Positive (85%), PR Negative, HER2 Positive (IHC 3+).
checklist.Radiology: Latest Scan (Mammogram): Irregular spiculated mass left breast 10 o'clock position measuring approximately 3.0cm. Architectural distortion. BI-RADS 5 - highly suspicious for malignancy. Recommend tissue diagnosis.
checklist.Genomics: ESR1 Y537S mutation detected. TMB is low.
checklist.Contraindications: Loaded 9 drug profiles. Breast cancer relevant: Doxorubicin, Cyclophosphamide, Paclitaxel, Trastuzumab, Pertuzumab (and 4 more)

patient_details.notes: All reports are present and do not contain any blockers or missing information. Overall status is READY.

patient_details.case_priority: High - TNBC, young age, renal impairment

checklist.Clinical: 45-year-old female with Stage IIA triple-negative invasive ductal carcinoma of the right breast. Comorbidities include chronic kidney disease Stage 3a, vitamin D deficiency, and obesity (BMI 31.2).
checklist.Pathology: Invasive ductal carcinoma, Grade 3, ER Negative, PR Negative, HER2 Negative (IHC 0).
